remarks: The product of two nonzero numbers is nonzero.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 27-May-2016.)
statement:
msq0d.1 $e |- ( ph -> A e. CC ) $.
mul0ord.2 $e |- ( ph -> B e. CC ) $.
mulne0d.3 $e |- ( ph -> A =/= 0 ) $.
mulne0d.4 $e |- ( ph -> B =/= 0 ) $.
mulne0d $p |- ( ph -> ( A x. B ) =/= 0 ) $.
